entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
